mods.abstract: Street in Boulak area in Cairo; Street scene of Boulak, a small port town within the city of Cairo; several balconies or mashrabiya project from contemporary buildings on either side of street; Egyptian people mill about; "Zangaki N 379 Rue de Boulac Caire." in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
